p: The number of workers seropositive for RVFV was 14 giving an apparent seroprevalence of RVFV in slaughterhouse workers of 2.5% (95% CI 1.5–4.2). The survey-adjusted prevalence was 2.6% (95% CI 1.3–3.9). The true prevalence accounting for the sensitivity and specificity of the test was 0.3% (95% CI 0.0–1.2%).
